channel.title: New Features & Releases on

item.title: SeaChat Release History
item.description: 07/11/2024 # New Features and Improvements # Create workspace automatically when onboarding new users Allow Premium plan to hide Seasalt.ai SeaChat branding message in Agent design styles 07/04/2024 # New Features and Improvements # Agent list page: To make the screen consistent, only display the first row of prompts. SeaChat landing page now supports Portuguese, Korean, Russian, Spanish, and Vietnamese. Added a new TTS voice for Chinese: Tongtong voice.
